maqras.text: 25|21|Ara yara amadera saksatera asa kare na tara bale, ‘amadera kache phirisata nayila kara haya na kena? Athaba amara amadera rabake dekhi na kena?’ Tara to tadera antare ahankara posana kare [1] ebam tara gurutara abadhyataya mete utheche.
25|22|Yedina tara phirisataderake dekhate pabe sedina aparadhidera jan'ya kono susambada thakabe na ebam tara balabe, ‘raksa kara, raksa kara[1].’
25|23|Ara amara tadera krtakarmera prati agrasara haye seguloke biksipta dhulikanaya parinata karaba.
25|24|Sedina jannatabasidera basasthana habe utkrsta ebam bisramasthala habe manorama [1].
25|25|Ara sedina akasa bidirna habe meghapunja dbara [1] ebam dale dale phirisataderake namiye deya habe
25|26|se dina curanta kartrtba habe dayamayera [1] ebam kapheradera jan'ya se dina habe atyanta kathina.
25|27|Yalima [1] byakti sedina nijera du‘hata dansana karate karate balabe, ‘haya, ami yadi rasulera sathe kono patha abalambana karatama [2]
25|28|‘Haya, durbhoga amara, ami yadi amukake bandhurupe grahana na karatama
25|29|‘amake to se bibhranta karechila amara kache upadesa paumchara para.’ Ara sayatana to manusera jan'ya mahaprataraka.
25|30|Ara rasula balalena, ‘he amara raba! Amara sampradaya to e kura'anake parityajya sabyasta kareche.’
25|31|Allah‌ balena, ‘ara ebhabe'i amara pratyeka nabira jan'ya aparadhidera theke satru baniye thaki. Ara apanara raba'i pathapradarsaka o sahayyakarirupe yathesta.’

25|32|Ara kapherara bale, ‘samagra kura'ana tara kache ekabare nayila halo na kena?’ Ebhabe'i amara nayila karechi apanara hrdayake ta dbara mayabuta karara jan'ya ebam ta krame krame spastabhabe abrtti karechi.
25|33|Ara tara apanara kache ye bisaya'i upasthita kare na kena, amara setara sathika samadhana o sundara byakhya apanara kache niye asi.
25|34|Yaderake mukhera upara bhara diye cala abasthaya jahannamera dike ekatra kara habe, tara sthanera dika theke ati nikrsta ebam adhika pathabhrasta.
25|35|Ara amara to musake kitaba diyechilama ebam tara sathe tara bha'i harunake sahayyakari karechilama
25|36|atahpara amara balechilama, ‘tomara se sampradayera kache ya'o yara amara nidarsanabalite mithyaropa kareche [1].’ Tarapara amara taderake sampurnarupe bidhbasta karechilama

25|37|ara nuhera sampradayake'o, yakhana tara rasulaganera prati mithya aropa karala [1] takhana amara taderake dubiye dilama ebam taderake manusera jan'ya nidarsanasbarupa kare rakhalama. Ara yalimadera jan'ya amara yantranadayaka sasti prastuta kare rekhechi.
25|38|Ara amara dhbansa karechilama ‘ada, samuda, ‘ras‌’ [1] -era adhibasike ebam tadera antarbartikalera bahu prajanmake'o
25|39|ara amara tadera pratyekera jan'ya drstanta barnana karechilama ebam tadera sakalake'i amara sampurnarupe dhbansa karechilama.
25|40|Ara tara to se janapada diye'i yatayata kare yara upara barsita hayechila akalyanera brsti, tabe ki tara esaba dekhate paya na [1]? Bastuta tara punarut'thanera asa'i kare na.
25|41|Ara tara yakhana apanake dekhe, takhana tara apanake sudhu thatta-bidrarupera patrarupe ganya kare, bale, ‘e-i ki se, yake allah‌ rasula kare pathiyechena

25|42|‘se to amaderake amadera upasyagana hate dure sariye'i dita, yadi na amara tadera anugatyera upara abicala thakatama.’ Ara yakhana tara sasti pratyaksa karabe, takhana janate parabe ke adhika pathabhrasta.
25|43|Apani ki take dekhechena, ye tara prabrttike ilaharupe grahana kare? Tabu'o ki apani tara yim'madara habena
25|44|naki apani mane karena ye, tadera adhikansa sone athaba bojhe? Tara to pasura mata'i; baram tara ara'o adhika pathabhrasta.
25|45|Apani ki apanara rabera prati laksya karena na [1] kibhabe tini chaya samprasarita karena? Tini icche karale etake to sthira rakhate paratena; tarapara amara suryake karechi era nirdesaka.
25|46|Tarapara amara etake amadera dike dhire dhire gutiye ani.
25|47|Ara tini'i tomadera jan'ya ratake karechena abaranasbarupa, bisramera jan'ya tomadera diyechena nidraa [1] ebam chariye parara jan'ya karechena dina [2].
25|48|Ara tini'i tamra rahamatera brstira age susambadabahirupe bayu prerana karena ebam amara akasa hate pabitra pani barsana kari [1]
25|49|yate ta dbara amara mrta bhu-khandake sanjibita kari ebam amara ya srsti karechi tara madhya hate bahu jibajantu o manusake ta pana kara'i [1]
25|50|ara amara to ta tadera madhye bitarana kari yate tara smarana kare. Atahpara adhikansa loka sudhu akrtajnata'i prakasa kare [1].
25|51|Ara amara icche karale pratiti janapade ekajana satarkakari pathate paratama.
25|52|Kaje'i apani kapheradera anugatya karabena na ebam apani kura'anera sahayye tadera sathe bara jihada caliye yana.
